question: How many workshops can I register for?
answer: No bar at all! We will not limit your learning. :)

question: Are there any workshop slot clashes?
answer: No workshop clashes at all. There are different slot for all workshops.The schedule will be shared once you register yourself.

question: Where are the workshops going to be held?
answer: They will be held in a virtual set up using the Zoom Video Conferencing Tool.

question: Will the workshop sessions be interactive?
answer: Well, it will be if you want it to be! Our instructors are industry professionals who are quite eager to interact with the young audience.

question: Is it possible to cancel/refund the registration once done?
answer: We do not encourage refund and cancellation of registrations

question: When will I get my e-certificate?
answer: E-Certificates will be given only if you are present for the entire session of your registered workshop. They will be circulated via email once E-Summit has concluded.
